import React, { Component } from 'react' import Intro from './intro'; import './css/profilepage.css'; import Createpost from './createpost'; import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import ShowImages from '../images/image'; class home extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { userId:this.props.user.user[0].id, image:'' } } render() { const user = this.props.user.user; return (
{user[0].firstName} {user[0].surName}
Timeline
About
Friends
) } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { user: state.user, }; } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(home) //http://localhost:8080/auth/signup/updateprofilepic/
